DOC.brief_summary: In Post Market Clinical Follow-up Study ( PMCF Study ) , short-term clinical radiological result cementless Excia T® prosthesis routine clinical use shall assess migration take place first 24 month evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Written patient consent study participation Age > 18 year Indication primary THA cementless Excia T® stem Pregnancy THA fracture Rheumatoid arthritis Systemic disorder , treat Cortisone pharmaceutical , potentially compromise bone quality Patient physically mentally able follow postoperative examination routine
